name: Dataglade
headline: The smart way to research stocks.
description: Dataglade is the smart way to research stocks. Our AI generates clear analyses and financial models for any public company, and our fundamental data fulfills almost every research need. We save investors hours every day by eliminating the need to manually dig through financial filings. Customers trust our reports because every number is backed by citations to our proprietary financial data warehouse. We inform $1+ billion of trades every day, and we’re just getting started. Check us out at dataglade.com.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:finance; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Ash Rai, Founder
founders.description: Ash is the Co-Founder and CEO of Dataglade. Before Dataglade, Ash founded a hedge fund from his freshman dorm room at Vanderbilt and grew it to $1 million AUM before turning 20. He was the country’s youngest-ever registered investment advisor. While running the fund, Ash was cut off from his university’s Bloomberg Terminal for overuse, so he built his own solution. Ash graduated early from Vanderbilt University with degrees in Economics, History, and Classics.

founders.name: Patrick Higgins, Founder
founders.description: Patrick grew up tinkering with whatever computers he could get his hands on, building apps with his friends, and learning lessons from trying to trade the stock market. Now, he's building Dataglade.

Backed by
Data Integrity
Quality data for your most important decisions.
Dataglade is built on a robust foundation of clean, real-time data with accuracy you can trust. Every fundamental number links to its source, so you never just have to take our word for it.
[Rich fundamentals coverage](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL>)| [Fundamentals, ratios, multiples, comparables, earnings, and more on 48,000+ companies.](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL>)  
---|---  
[Live options flow and insider trades](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/live>)| [Discover what’s moving markets with live options flow and real-time insider trades.](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/live>)  
[Link your own internal data](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)| [Securely link internal data to Dataglade’s AI to surface proprietary insights, instantly.](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)  
![](https://dataglade.com/images/two/wreath.svg)
$1+ billion traded daily
The world’s biggest institutions trust Dataglade to inform trades of $1+ billion every day.
[Click on any fundamental number to view its source.We stand behind the accuracy of our data, and you don’t just have to take our word for it. All fundamentals on Dataglade link to their source, so you can easily validate them yourself.View Fundamentals![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL>)[Lightning-fast data for every need.High-speed data is essential to keep an accurate pulse on the markets. Dataglade meets your needs with real-time fundamental and market data.View Live Options Flow![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/live>)
Data for every use case.
Dataglade's fundamental and market data meets the needs of billion-dollar institutions and individual traders alike.
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/buySide_Selected.svg)Buy-Side Investor
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/ib_Gray.svg)Investment Banking
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/wealth_Gray.svg)Wealth Management
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/consulting_Gray.svg)Consulting
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/bd_Gray.svg)Business Development
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/dev_Gray.svg)Developers
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/academia_Gray.svg)Academia
Track Analyst Estimates From Top Institutions
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
Monitor real-time analyst estimates from top-tier institutions including Goldman Sachs, J.P. Morgan, Morgan Stanley, and 100+ others. Discover revisions, price targets, and recommendations the second they’re released.
[Go to Analyst Estimates![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL/estimates>)
Explore Comprehensive Financial Data
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
Access real-time financials and market data for 48,000+ companies. Compare ratios and multiples across comp sets. Toggle between normalized and as-reported values.
[Go to Fundamentals![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL>)
View Earnings Results, Call Summaries, and Transcripts
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
View earnings results as soon as they’re released, and easily compare them with market expectations. Instantly access KPIs discussed in every earnings call, alongside call summaries to extract insights efficiently.
[Go to Earnings![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL/earnings>)
Deep-Dive Into Companies with GladeAI
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
Dive deeper into any company with a single prompt. Explore supplier relationships, industry trends, competitive pressures, management commentary, and more. All insights are backed by citations to ensure their reliability.
[Go to GladeAI![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/ai>)
Generate Complex Business Analyses, Instantly
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
Quickly generate detailed analyses for any company, including SWOT, MECE, BCG, and more. All insights are backed by earnings calls, financial filings, and real-time news citations, ensuring their reliability.
[Go to SWOT Analysis![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets/AAPL/earnings>)
Monitor Live Options Flow and Insider Trades
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
Immediately learn when insiders are buying and selling. Monitor market activity and identify significant transactions with live options flow.
[Go to Live Options Flow![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/live>)
Screen Stocks With 100+ Criteria
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronDown_Gray.svg)
Screen for any stock based on 100+ criteria, including market data, fundamentals, ratios, and multiples. Discover large-cap stocks with low multiples, small-cap stocks with rapid revenue growth, or anything in between.
[Go to Screening![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/screening>)
Comprehensive data coverage across 50+ markets and asset classes.
Dataglade provides full coverage of 30+ asset classes in 20+ geographies, with more added continuously. Plus, securely link internal data to Dataglade’s AI to generate proprietary insights, instantly.
[![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/equities_Gray.svg)48,000+ EquitiesReal-time fundamental and market data on 48,000+ equities.Go to Equities![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/assets>)| [![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/options_Gray.svg)180,000+ Equity OptionsLive options flow, options chains, Greeks, and more.Go to Options![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/live>)| [![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/bonds_Gray.svg)300,000+ Fixed Income SecuritiesCorporate debt, government debt, and asset-backed securities.Contact Sales![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)| [![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/commodities_Gray.svg)3,000+ Commodities / DerivativesSpot prices, futures, options on futures, and more.Contact Sales![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)  
---|---|---|---  
[![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/currency_Gray.svg)2,000+ Currency Pairs / DerivativesSpot prices, futures, options, and more.Contact Sales![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)| [![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/insiders_Gray.svg)100,000+ InsidersReal-time insider trades, transaction histories, and holdings.Go to Insiders![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/insiders>)| [![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/funds_Gray.svg)20,000+ Hedge and Mutual FundsReal-time performance, trades, and holdings.Go to Funds![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/app.dataglade.com/funds>)| [![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/funds_Gray.svg)Global MacroYield curves and economic data on 200+ countries.Contact Sales![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)  
![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/clouds_Gray.svg)LINK INTERNAL DATA
Link internal data to Dataglade.Instantly unlock proprietary AI insights, custom dashboards, and more.
Customize Dataglade’s AI to fit your firm’s needs by integrating your internal business intelligence, relationship data, and more. All information is linked with strict security protocols, ensuring it stays confidential. Both structured and unstructured datasets are supported.
[Contact Us to Learn More![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)
Take your investment research to the next level. Get started today.
[Contact Sales![](https://dataglade.com/images/icons/chevronRight_Blue.svg)](https://dataglade.com/<https:/calendly.com/ashrai/dataglade-introduction>)

generated_description:
### Dataglade: The Smart Way to Research Stocks

**Overview**  
Dataglade emerged on the scene in 2022, fueled by a mission to revolutionize stock research using AI. Based in New York and operating with a lean team of two, this startup is creating ripples in the fintech industry by automating stock analysis and significantly cutting research time for investors.

**Core Offering**  
At its core, Dataglade harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to generate clear analyses and robust financial models for any public company. This eliminates hours of tedious manual labor spent sifting through financial filings. By providing solid fundamental data, Dataglade tackles nearly every research need an investor might encounter and backs its reports with citations from its proprietary financial data warehouse. The result? Trustworthy insights that inform over $1 billion in trades daily.

**Key Features**  
- **Comprehensive Data:** Dataglade provides extensive financial data on more than 48,000 public companies, covering key aspects from fundamentals to ratios and multiples.
- **Market Intelligence:** Institutions, hedge funds, and wealth managers rely on Dataglade for up-to-date market insights and decisions.
- **Real-Time Tracking:** With features like live options flow and insider trade monitoring, users can get immediate updates on market movements.
- **Customizable Research:** Investors can easily customize their data related to internal business intelligence, enhancing the reliability of insights.

**Innovative Solutions**  
Dataglade isn't just rehashing what’s already available; it’s introducing innovative tools like GladeAI, which dives deeper into companies and generates analyses based on real-time data. From technical stock screening to generating complex business analyses (think SWOT or BCG), users have a comprehensive suite of tools to elevate their investment research.

**About the Founders and Team**  
Founded as part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2023 batch, Dataglade is driven by Jared Friedman, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. The team’s small size may seem modest, but it allows for agile moves and rapid innovation in a fast-paced industry.

**Conclusion**  
If you're tired of traditional stock research methods that eat up your time, Dataglade offers a fresh, efficient alternative. With its AI-driven insights and solid backing by a reliable data foundation, it’s poised to become an indispensable tool for savvy investors everywhere.

For more information, check out their website at [dataglade.com](https://dataglade.com).
